title: Duke!Zone II
author: Simply Silly Software, WizardWorks, NightFright
description:
https://forums.duke4.net/topic/7655-dukezone-ii-playability-edit/

Duke!ZONE II is an expanded 1997 re-release of Duke!ZONE and an authorized expansion pack for Duke Nukem 3D.

This release removes a few problems you may encounter while playing the Duke!Zone II addon while also providing minor polishing.
